dt: {bc}something kept from the knowledge of others or shared only confidentially with a few
{bc}a method, formula, or process used in an art or operation and divulged only to those of one's own company or craft {bc}{sx|trade secret||}
{bc}the practices or knowledge making up the shared discipline or culture of an esoteric society
{bc}a prayer traditionally said inaudibly by the celebrant just before the preface of the mass
{bc}something taken to be a specific or key to a desired end

shortdef: something kept hidden or unexplained : mystery
something kept from the knowledge of others or shared only confidentially with a few
a method, formula, or process used in an art or operation and divulged only to those of one's own company or craft : trade secret

dt: {bc}a supposedly secret but generally known matter

shortdef: a supposedly secret but generally known matter

dt: {bc}something (such as a formula) which has economic value to a business because it is not generally known or easily discoverable by observation and for which efforts have been made to maintain secrecy

shortdef: something (such as a formula) which has economic value to a business because it is not generally known or easily discoverable by observation and for which efforts have been made to maintain secrecy
